description: Singi-X Trousers for men are made of G-1000 Stretch Eco with stretch panels in the yoke and hip area that give a flexible fit that adapts to your body shape. The seat and thigh areas are roomy enough for base layers underneath while the lower legs are tapered to reduce bulk and risk of wear and tear. They have multiple functional pockets, integrated ventilation and an integrated, detachable webbing belt. Articulated knees with openings for kneepads (an accessory). Adjustable leg endings with boot hooks.
name: Fjallraven Singi X-Trousers, Short - Mens
